```{r}

head(sheet.pull,5)

  filter(HH_ID == "A")
  
mean(hh.a$Time_since_last_pull)

hh.b = sheet.pull %>%
  filter(HH_ID == "B")
  
mean(hh.b$Time_since_last_pull)

  filter(HH_ID == "C")
  
mean(hh.c$Time_since_last_pull)
```
